overview: As Vice President of Sales, Ryan Speir draws on his extensive sales, marketing, leadership, management and business development skills to drive Defender sales. Prior to joining ArcMail, Ryan was CEO and Founder of Syzygy Group LLC and part of the executive management team at 3t Systems. Throughout his career, Ryan has developed innovative indirect sales channels, designed Master Value Added Reseller (VAR) programs and sold technology solutions to numerous businesses throughout North America including several Fortune 100 companies
